text: João Martins is the name of: *João Baptista Martins (1927–1993), Portuguese football forward *João Carlos Martins (born 1940), Brazilian classical pianist *João Paulo Neto Martins (born 1988), Portuguese football midfielder *João Cleófas Martins (1901–1970), Cape Verdean photographer *João Pedro Pinto Martins (born 1982), Angolan football forward
title: João Martins
